channel.title: Client help
channel.description: K i used a client and made a new uppit link i didnt know it would take u to another server then some pplz from server dowloaded. It worked perfectly but took them to another server. So i fixed it so it went to my server and it worked for me. Then i put on uppit then they try to dowload then it works but when they run the client it just freezes at the "loading title part" how do i fix this[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 13, 2008, 04:30:52 PM[/size][hr]plZ[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 13, 2008, 04:34:20 PM[/size][hr]anyone????? Dont keep saying ur breaking rules but i need help so bad ill *r*e*p*

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

K i used a client and made a new uppit link i didnt know it would take u to another server then some pplz from server dowloaded. It worked perfectly but took them to another server. So i fixed it so it went to my server and it worked for me. Then i put on uppit then they try to dowload then it works but when they run the client it just freezes at the “loading title part” how do i fix this[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 13, 2008, 04:30:52 PM[/size][hr]plZ[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 13, 2008, 04:34:20 PM[/size][hr]anyone??? Dont keep saying ur breaking rules but i need help so bad ill rep
